name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Fluxiom
description: This is a repository of fluxiom APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Fluxiom
apis.description: Fluxiom offers seamless online file management in the cloud. Keep your files private, share them with a select audience or broadcast them to the world.
